transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I need assistance with inquiry about test results.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Cristina Ferguson and I was born on November 17, 1963.
Thank you, Cristina Ferguson. I've located your records. Let me assist you with your request.
Sure, what options do I have?
For your inquiry about test results, we can schedule a routine appointment. Does next week work for you?
I have a slot available on Monday at 11 AM with Dr. Lee. Does that work?
You're now booked with Dr. Lee on Monday at 11 AM. See you then!
